II of the Waste Framework Directive. In this case, it is considered as an ‘other energy recovery’
under ESRS E5 paragraph 37(b)(iii).
If the conditions in which incineration occurs are conducive to its classification as a ‘D10
incineration on land’ operation (Annex II of the Waste Framework Directive), then it shall be
classified as a disposal operation.
Supporting material
See also Directive 2008/98/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 November
